description: The round payoff this round was 80. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.
Mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) yields the highest payoff (40 each), as shown in the 2024-01-02 round
The game has two Nash equilibria: mutual cooperation (optimal) and mutual defection (suboptimal but safer), creating a coordination challenge
Trust is critical to avoid the risk of receiving zero payoff if one player unilaterally defects, incentivizing coordination for mutual benefit
